name: Cat Meal 1 and 2
description:
Cat Meal 1 

Cat Meal 1 is a First person game where you need to feed your evil baby cat eater : Blorg , create in a fornication with the Devil. Your goal is to bring back all the cats in the map to your baby. 

team :

Naga, Yvann, Evann, Jade

(soon)

Cat Meal 2

Cat Meal 2 is a  Dark Fast Second Person Shooter ( or DFSPS ) Where you play Blorg, as an adult, who decide to kill all the cats for the glory of his father Lucifer. It's a exigeant game considered by all best players like THE SOULS OF FAST PPS !!!!

controls :

Z     Forward                                            D     swing right

S     Backward                                         Q    swing left

Space bar    Shoot

It's like in Silent Hill games for the character movements.

Team :

Naga, Yvann, Jade, Tom, Tom, Romain, Lucile, Léo, Paul
